root: ^Surprised to hear from me? Yes, yes, we
^both said hurtful things in the heat of the
^...and more to the point, things are a bit
^on fire back home, so I’m hitching along
^To my point! Since I'm so uprooted, could
^you put me through to Crete's high
^I can help them move all that illicit
^grain, feed these noble travellers with it.
^And who'd begrudge me a modest cut?

Port5: ^Knossos helps out the people more than
^ruling over them...pays to have a heart.
^Well, it’s a comforting thought now I don’t live surrounded by gold and servants, anyway.
